About Processing Modes

Line-by-Line (Max 10)

This is the most robust and compatible method. It processes each line of your script individually, making a separate API call for each one.

  • Works with up to 10 speakers.
  • This is the recommended default as it is the most reliable method.

Multi-Speaker (Faster, Max 2)

This is a faster method that sends the entire script to the API in one go. It may result in more natural pacing between speakers.

  • This mode has a strict limit of 2 speakers.
  • Warning: This mode is unlikely to work reliably inside the Canvas environment with the default key. It is designed for use with a proper Custom API Key, which may incur costs based on your usage.

Opens a modal to rewrite the script, aiming for a longer target duration by adding more conversational exchanges.

üí¨ Add Exchanges

This rewrites the script to be longer by adding more back-and-forth turns between the speakers, extending the overall length of the dialogue.

üé≠ Add Expressions

This analyzes the script and adds powerful markup tags (e.g., `[laughing]`, `[shouting]`, `[short pause]`) to precisely control the audio performance, including non-speech sounds, tone, and pacing. The original text is not changed.

üìù Export Raw Script

Downloads the exact, unmodified content from the script editor as a plain text (.txt) file. This is useful for backups or editing in other applications.

üìÑ Export Markdown

Downloads a formatted Markdown (.md) file of the current script. This version includes a title, a list of speakers, and the dialogue with speaker names in bold for easy reading.

About Podcast Studio

Welcome to the Podcast Studio! This application leverages the power of Google's Gemini API to transform your text scripts into high-quality, multi-speaker audio productions. Whether you're a content creator, a storyteller, or just experimenting, you can create engaging podcast-style conversations with ease.

Key Features

  • AI Script Writing & Enhancement: Don't have a script? No problem! Use the "Write with AI" feature to generate a complete script from a simple prompt. You can also use the various AI tools to improve an existing script, make it longer, or add natural-sounding expressions.
  • Multi-Speaker Support: Configure up to 10 unique speakers for your podcast. The script parser will automatically detect which speaker is talking based on the "Speaker #: ..." format.
  • Extensive Voice Library: Choose from a wide selection of high-quality, pre-built voices to give each speaker a distinct personality. You can preview each voice with the play button.
  • Flexible Processing Modes: Choose between "Line-by-Line" for maximum reliability with up to 10 speakers, or the faster "Multi-Speaker" mode for dialogues with 2 speakers (best with a custom API key).
  • MP3 & WAV Formats: Export your final audio in either the compressed, web-friendly MP3 format or the uncompressed, high-fidelity WAV format.
  • Script Export: Easily export your script to a text file with speaker names included for convenient sharing and editing outside the app.

How It Works

  1. Write or Generate a Script: Type your script in the main text area, ensuring each line of dialogue begins with "Speaker 1:", "Speaker 2:", etc. or use the AI writer.
  2. Configure Speakers: Add speakers, give them names, and select a unique voice for each.
  3. Choose Options: Select your preferred processing mode and audio format.
  4. Create: Click "Create Podcast" and let Gemini work its magic! The audio will be generated and presented in the player below.

This application is powered by the Google Gemini API. Enjoy creating!
